questions.question: What are the three terminals of a power IGBT?
Which is suitable for making the Variable frequency drives?
What is the controlling parameter in IGBT?
What is the structure of the IGBT?

answers.a: P-N-P structure connected by a MOS gate
answers.b: N-N-P-P structure connected by a MOS gate
answers.c: P-N-P-N structure connected by a MOS gate
answers.d: N-P-N-P structure connected by a MOS gate

questions.question: For the power semiconductor devices IGBT, MOSFET, Diode and Thyristor, which one of the following statements is true?

answers.a: All the four are majority carrier devices
answers.b: All the four are minority carrier devices
answers.c: IGBT and MOSFET are majority carrier devices, whereas Diode and Thyristor are minority carrier devices
answers.d: MOSFET is majority carrier device, whereas IGBT, Diode Thyristor are minority carrier devices
